name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: World of Warcraft Sylvanas Windrunner Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the chilling world of Sylvanas Windrunner with dark visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the dark elegance of Sylvanas Windrunner from World of Warcraft with this powerful live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A haunting and majestic interface inspired by Sylvanas’ tragic journey, strength, and the chilling beauty of the Banshee Queen.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that reflects Sylvanas’ unyielding resolve and noble yet dark nature.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Engage with WoW-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as powerful and commanding as Sylvanas herself.
